name: Xarax
overview: Inspired by Xevious the plot is basically "bomb and blast the way to the salvation of your world", which is an excuse for you to control a ship and bomb gun placements and blast flying alien craft. The game is a vertically scrolling top down game and with a joystick or keyboard you control your ship over seven levels. One or two players can play and each take it in turn when the other player loses a life. As well as the main playing area you can also see your score and lives.
